title: New Relic | Software Engineer 2 | Hyderabad | Accepted
content:
*Had to delete my last post as it said topic not available*
* Education: B.Tech in CSE
* Years of Experience: 3 years 0 months
* Prior Experience: Software Engineer in Product based MNC
* Date of the Offer: June 2024
* Company: New Relic
* Title/Level: Software Engineer 2 (Fullstack but mostly Frontend)
* Location: Hyderabad
* Salary: 28.9 LPA
* Variable Pay: 5% of Base - 1.44 LPA
* Relocation: Nil
* Signing Bonus: Nil
* Stock bonus: Nil
* Total comp (Salary + Variable): 30.3 LPA
* Benefits: Monthy Sodexo of Rs.2100 + Monthy Rs.1500 of Health/Fitness funds. Also good health and term life insurance coverage.
* Interview Rounds: Online test(Two tests, one DSA and other on React) -> System Design on Frontend -> DSA Round -> HR
* Interview Experience:
	* **System Design Round**: Design an academic portal where teachers, students and admin can login. Think of all the features you can have. Give a rough UI/UX. Draw component tree if you want. Also, had discussions on authentication using JWT and other features which I can implement. No LLD btw. 
	* **DSA Round**: Bactracking Question (similar to rat in a maze). Some discussions on general Computer Science concepts. Also, discussions on HLD of current company projects.
